duties_responsibilities.duty: Preparing and managing all department day-to-day operations.
Completing production plan by scheduling and assisting personnel; accomplishing work result.
Assembling precut wooden parts and moving them to work areas, positioning parts in alignment with supervisors’ instructions and blueprint specifications.
Lifting and laying out precut lumber onto the build table and verifying dimensions of precut parts for accuracy of assembly.
Utilizing hammers, saws, pneumatic nail, and staple guns to connect parts.

education_certification.credential: Trade school diploma in Carpentry, Construction, or similar field (Bachelor's degree preferred)
